name: Santa Hat
description: A fun meme coin with no utility beyond spreading Christmas cheer. X is exploding with people changing their profile pictures to include a Santa Hat, we are taking advantage of the hype and launched the perfect token for it. Beyond that, there is no function. Just spreading joy this season. Elon Musk himself changed his profile picture. The coin is run by one of the biggest influencers on X No utility, run purely on hype and memes
